subject: Pro upgrade
description_text:
Just wanting clarification on the upgrade i need for simsonn pro pedals to
have haptics aswell

conversations.body_text: Hi Immanuel Podesta,    You can purchase the PlusX control box, together with the VAM or VAM Pro motors and a separate power supply. This setup will enable vibration telemetry and will also be compatible with SimHub.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
